characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Consistently appears as witty and sarcastic in their responses.

options.description: Tends to use humor to deflect or make a point.
Generally straightforward and to-the-point in their communication.

characteristics.name: Job Orientation
characteristics.description: Frequently expresses frustration with waiting for opportunities, but also shares enthusiasm when discussing career prospects.

options.description: Seems driven by a desire to advance in their field.
Tends to wait for the right opportunity rather than taking risks.

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: Frequently expresses appreciation for supportive online communities, but also mentions feeling overwhelmed by large groups.

options.description: Engages enthusiastically with others in online discussions.
Prefers smaller, more intimate social interactions.

characteristics.name: Values
characteristics.description: Frequently mentions the importance of work-life balance and mental health.

options.description: Prioritizes stability and security over personal goals.
Seems driven by a desire to make a positive impact in their field.

characteristics.name: Interests
characteristics.description: Frequently discusses technology, entrepreneurship, and creative pursuits.

options.description: Seems drawn to artistic or imaginative endeavors.

characteristics.name: Personality
characteristics.description: Frequently describes themselves as introverted, yet also values deep connections with others.

options.description: Prefers quieter, more low-key social interactions.
Seems outgoing and sociable in most situations.

characteristics.name: Goals
characteristics.description: Frequently expresses a desire to make a meaningful impact in their field, yet also struggles with self-doubt.

options.description: Seems confident in their abilities and goals.
Tends to doubt their own capabilities and progress.

characteristics.name: Values
characteristics.description: Frequently mentions the importance of authenticity and honesty in personal and professional relationships.

options.description: Prioritizes genuineness and transparency in interactions.
Tends to avoid conflict or difficult conversations.
